description: Complete system overview covering the agent orchestration architecture, multi-tenant design, and high-level component interactions
Detailed documentation of agent data models, including category classifications, capabilities, connector requirements, trigger mechanisms, and KPI definitions
Comprehensive documentation of the agent execution pipeline, including budget controls, PII handling, approval workflows, and tool call routing
Detailed specification of the multi-tenant security model, including resource isolation, budget controls, and usage tracking algorithms
Documentation of the usage-based billing system, including pricing formulas, metering mechanisms, and real-time usage calculations
